message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your business operations. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $9500. This is a special introductory price, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and the benefits it provides.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and I respect your valuation of the product. Considering the quality and unique features of this item, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $8200. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still think $7800 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to go as high as $7800, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I've considered your offer carefully, and I'm proposing a price of $8000 for the product. This price reflects both the value of the product and the importance of maintaining a good relationship with you as a potential long-term customer.
